mapper.select: SELECT b.title, b.content, c.category_name, u.nickname, DATE_FORMAT(b.created_at, '%Y년-%m월-%d일')date FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.users_id = u.users_id JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.category_id WHERE board_id=#{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(title, content, users_id, category_id, updated_at, created_at) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{usersId}, #{categoryId}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, category_id = #{categoryId}
